lead_paragraph: The San Jose Sharks used a tight-checking defense and solid goaltending to snap a three-game losing streak and get a lengthy road trip off to a positive start.

headline.print_headline: Jones Has 24 Saves to Lead Sharks Over Capitals 3-0
headline.main: Jones Has 24 Saves to Lead Sharks Over Capitals 3-0
